EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Subrecipient after site visit report approved
EmailTemplate.name: Report sent to subrecipient
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitReport__c} is ready for review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SiteVisit__c.GranteePOC__c},
This email is to notify you that, a site visit report for site visit {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitName__c} has been generated and approved.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
